      • createSensor

        public static CreateSensorMessage createSensor(java.lang.String port,
                                               Sensors sensorType,
                                               int networkPort)
        Message send to brick to create a SensorEndpoint at the brick.
        Parameters:
        port - the ID of the port on the EV3 brick
        sensorType - the type of sensor to assume at the given port
        networkPort - the TCP port to use
        Returns:
        the prepared message

        networkPort - the TCP port to use
